content:
Welcome back, talented creator! The blogger you've been working with is thrilled with your blog illustrations and now has a new challenge for you. He wants to ensure his images are perfectly optimized for various social media platforms to maximize engagement and reach.

In this lesson, we'll explore how to adjust images to meet the specifications of different platforms. By the end of this lesson, you'll be a pro at optimizing images for optimal display and engagement across all major platforms. Let's dive in!
